intent_atoms.description: Create SDK Tolerant Parsing Documentation for ISOInspectorKit
Documentation includes DocC article TolerantParsingGuide.md in specified path
Add code examples for tolerant parsing setup and ParseIssueStore usage
Link new guide from main Documentation.md Topics section
Verify examples with test file in Tests/ISOInspectorKitTests/
Integrate FoundationUI dependency into ISOInspectorKit project
FoundationUI dependency is added and builds successfully
Zero SwiftLint violations, ≥80% test coverage after integration
Create 123 comprehensive integration tests for FoundationUI components
Integration tests cover Badge, Card, KeyValueRow and other components with 33/43/40/7 tests
Accessibility compliance ≥98% WCAG 2.1 AA for badge component
Migrate Badge & Status Indicators to DS.Badge

functional_units.name: Tolerant Parsing Documentation
functional_units.description: DocC article explaining SDK tolerant parsing setup and ParseIssueStore usage, including code examples and inline documentation updates for ParsePipeline.Options

functional_units.name: FoundationUI Dependency Integration
functional_units.description: Adds FoundationUI as a dependency to the project and ensures it builds successfully

functional_units.name: Integration Test Suite
functional_units.description: A comprehensive suite of 123 integration tests covering Badge, Card, KeyValueRow, and Integration components

functional_units.name: Component Showcase App
functional_units.description: Live ComponentTestApp providing over 14 screens showcasing FoundationUI components

functional_units.name: Badge & Status Indicators Migration
functional_units.description: Migrates CorruptionBadge, SeverityBadge, ParseStateBadge to DS.Badge with unit tests and accessibility compliance

functional_units.name: Card Containers & Sections Implementation
functional_units.description: Implements Card container and section components in FoundationUI

functional_units.name: Key-Value Rows & Metadata Display Wrapper
functional_units.description: Creates BoxMetadataRow wrapper around DS.KeyValueRow for metadata display with extensive testing

functional_units.name: Floating Settings Panel Shell
functional_units.description: Implements SettingsPanelScene with FoundationUI cards, macOS NSPanel host, iPad/iOS sheet presentation and accessibility hooks

functional_units.name: Settings Persistence and Reset Wiring
functional_units.description: Threads permanent changes through UserPreferencesStore, updates session settings, adds reset actions and logs
